DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether EV06 is safe and effective in improving distance-corrected near vision in people who have presbyopia.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of EV06 Ophthalmic Solution in Improving Vision in Subjects With Presbyopia
DOC.criteria: 45 to 55 years of age DCNVA worse than 20/40 BCDVA of 20/20 or better in each eye Willing and able to sign consent, following study instructions Certain pupillary conditions Significant astigmatism, glaucoma, diabetes, cataracts, eye surgery, ocular trauma or accommodative issues contact lens wear within 3 days prior to and for duration of study use of prohibited medications participation in a clinical study within 30 days prior
